name: Jelly Belly & his friend Octo
description:
A cooperative multiplayer game. Jelly belly and Octo trying to escape from rooms by picking the key and opening the coral doors. Movement consumes energy so you need to collect the items and fill your belly. However, it you eat so much, you are gonna explode! Don't forget to avoid the little cute monster in every room which is out of space :))

For music and effects, mouth harp is used.

Music and Art by Salvija Vaičikonytė

Programming by Merve Tuncel
